mapper.insert: insert into band (band_code, band_name, band_admin, band_memberCount, band_content, band_thumnail, band_day) values(band_seq.nextval, #{band_name}, #{band_admin}, 1, #{band_content}, #{band_thumnail}, sysdate )

insert into band_feed (band_feed_num, band_code ,Member_id, band_feed_content, band_feed_uploadday, band_feed_updateday) values (band_feed_seq.nextval, #{band_code}, #{Member_id}, #{band_feed_content}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: select A.band_feed_num, A.band_code, A.Member_id, A.band_feed_content, A.band_feed_uploadday, A.band_feed_updateday, B.Member_profileimage from band_feed A right outer join carrier_member B on A.Member_id = B.Member_id where A.band_code = ${param1} order by A.band_feed_num desc
mapper.update: update band_feed set band_feed_content = #{band_feed_content} , band_feed_updateday = sysdate where member_id = #{member_id} and band_code = #{band_code} and band_feed_num = #{band_feed_num}
mapper.delete: delete from band_feed where band_feed_num = #{band_feed_num} and band_code = #{band_code}
